Arroceros Forest Park is a lush, green park in the heart of Manila, often referred to as the "Last Lung of Manila."
A historic walled city in Manila, known for its Spanish-era landmarks, including Fort Santiago, Manila Cathedral, and San Agustin Church.
A scenic promenade along Manila Bay, famous for its stunning sunset views and vibrant atmosphere, featuring restaurants, cafes, and street performers.

Crash Bandicoot is a video game franchise originally developed by Naughty Dog as an exclusive for Sony\'s PlayStation console. The series was originally produced by Universal Interactive, which later became known as Vivendi Games. In 2008, Vivendi merged with Activision, which currently owns and publishes the franchise. The goal of each level is to guide Crash from the beginning to the end, travelling either into the screen, towards the player or left and right in a side-scrolling manner. Several levels place Crash in unique situations which require the use of motorbikes, jet skis, submarines and various wild animals to complete the level.
